thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Hualian Hypermarket expects to return profitable in FY 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Hualian Hypermarket expects to return profitable in FY 2017

organizations.name: reuters) - beijing hualian hypermarket co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Beijing Hualian Hypermarket Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to be 94.2 million yuan
* Says the net loss of FY 2016 was 260.4 million yuan
* Comments that increased investment income and subsidy as well as close of partial loss-making stores as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/kwdTHC
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
